description:
Our attorney at the Olson Law Firm, LLC, provides dedicated medical malpractice and personal injury representation to people in the Atlanta, Georgia, area and throughout the state. When acts of negligence or omission on the part of health care providers cause patients to suffer serious injury or death, we strive to help them hold their physicians financially responsible. Our law firm accepts credit cards, and we offer free initial consultations.

Having more than 20 years of legal experience, our attorney understands the challenges that often come with pursuing medical malpractice claims. We are adept at presenting complex medical information in an approachable manner for judges and juries.

Whether suffered due to negligence on the part of their health care providers, as a result of motor vehicle accidents, or otherwise due to the careless or reckless actions of others, we know that those harmed through no fault of their own may have concerns about mounting medical bills, losing income and paying their bills. Our attorney aggressively pursues the maximum compensation on behalf of clients in cases involving car accidents, animal bites, birth injuries, brain injuries, dangerous or defective drugs and medical devices, nursing home abuse, premises liability, product liability, sexual abuse, trucking accidents and wrongful death. We also represent clients with bad faith insurance claims and assist those injured in construction accidents or otherwise as a result of performing their work duties to recover benefits through the state’s workers’ compensation program.

In addition to our personal injury and medical malpractice services, our attorney at the Olson Law Firm, LLC, provides business and commercial law representation. We assist clients with all types of business litigation cases, including those involving issues such as intellectual property, patents, health care and insurance law, contracts, legal malpractice and professional malpractice.
